Date: Thursday, 5/1/1986
Subject: Status of Ray Durazo
Dear Sir,
Ray Durazo shouldn't play at AA Sticky Wicketts!
He has an AVG of .221 over there, that might
be a sign that he has been promoted to soon. You
should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1986
Subject: Status of Joel Deleon
Dear Sir,
Joel Deleon isn't hitting the ball at all at AA Sticky Wicketts!
He has an AVG of .239, so a demotion is
the right choice. He shouldn't be emberassed any more.

Regards,
Scouting Director

a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
